title: Ocean Week
body:
No matter how many times i relog on the client or the website, I cannot see my contributions D;  Is this happening to anyone else???
I got the reward for the 1st city, I didn't get th e4 IP boost and i enrolled over a week ago. I am confused. Welp{{champion:32}}[](https://gyazo.com/dcf7246bbca55600d49ccc1c3187ac84)

replies.body:
Hey - I had a look into this for you, and it looks like you might be playing on one account and posting here from another. I can see that the account you're posting from enlisted and received the 4-win IP boost. 

The boards and enlist page share the sign-in information and it looks you have enlisted on your account with the 'aflyingbrownie' summoner name that  you're using to post here. From looking into your details, it looks like when you log on to the game to play you're actually using a different summoner name.  

If you log on the the website with the same details that you use to login and play, you should be able to enlist with that account - and future games will be tracked.
